languages.text: "Паскаль, составь послание отступникам Омниссии в рядах вандалов. Пусть они служат обретению Знания".
"Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, составь послание отступникам Омниссии в рядах вандалов. Пусть они служат обретению Знания".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, draft a message directed at the Omnissiah renegades. Let them serve for the attainment of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message directed at the Omnissiah renegades. Let them serve for the attainment of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message directed at the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message directed at the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."
"Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

languages.text: “帕斯卡，向欧姆尼塞亚的叛徒发送信息，说服他们以求知的名义为我效力。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，向欧姆尼塞亚的叛徒发送信息，说服他们以求知的名义为我效力。”
“帕斯卡，向欧姆尼塞亚的叛徒发送信息，说服他们为了获取知识服务。”

languages.text: «Pasqal, redacta un mensaje dirigido a los renegados Omnissianos. Que sirvan a la adquisición del Conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, redacta un mensaje dirigido a los renegados Omnissianos. Que sirvan a la adquisición del Conocimiento».

languages.text: 「パスカル、万機神の反逆者たちに向けたメッセージを起草するのだ。奴らに知識の習得に奉仕させるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、万機神の反逆者たちに向けたメッセージを起草するのだ。奴らに知識の習得に奉仕させるのだ」
「パスカル、万機神の反逆者たちに向けたメッセージを起草するのだ。奴らに知識の習得に奉仕させるのだ」

languages.text: « Pasqal, préparez un message pour ces renégats de l'Omnimessie. Qu'ils se mettent au service de l'acquisition de la Connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, préparez un message pour ces renégats de l'Omnimessie. Qu'ils se mettent au service de l'acquisition de la Connaissance. »

languages.text: "Pasqal, entwerft eine Nachricht an die abtrünnigen Diener des Omnissiah. Sie sollen der Erlangung des Wissens dienen."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, entwerft eine Nachricht an die abtrünnigen Diener des Omnissiah. Sie sollen der Erlangung des Wissens dienen."
"Pasqal, formuliert eine Nachricht an die abtrünnigen Diener des Omnissiah. Sie sollen der Erlangung des Wissens dienen."

languages.text: "Pasqal, Hermesihçi hainlere yönelik bir mesaj hazırla. İrfan elde ederek hizmetlerini sunsunlar."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, draft a message to the Omnissian renegades. Let them serve the acquisition of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, Hermesihçi hainlere yönelik bir mesaj hazırla. İrfan elde ederek hizmetlerini sunsunlar."
